message_1: Suppose you have a binary stream of length 16 and a key of length 8 for a stream cipher. Encrypt the first half of the stream using the key "01101101".
message_2: To encrypt the first half of the binary stream using the key "01101101", we will use the XOR operation. However, you have not provided the binary stream itself. Please provide the binary stream so that I can perform the encryption.
